resources.string: AV Downloader able to direct download any social media video without any watermark and supportable in every video player. You can download any video easily through AV Downloader App.

AV Downloader is very easy to use. First copy the link which video you want to download. Then go to AV Downloader App and select which plateform you copied the link. Paste and click the download button.It will take some time depending on your network bandwidth. Check notification panel to confirm downloading completed or not.
